description: The campaign was dominated by anger over the murder of an investigative journalist and his fianc¨¦e.
title: Slovakia election: Anti-corruption party takes lead
title_page: Slovakia election: Anti-corruption party takes lead - BBC News
maintext: True to form, former prime minister Robert Fico arrived at his party's election headquarters by the back door and left without speaking to reporters - and what was there to say? His party suffered its worst result in a decade of government; it's never recovered from the murder of Jan Kuciak, which took place on its watch.
